titles.title: A resolution recognizing Lieutenant Commander Chris Cassidy, space shuttle mission specialist of the STS-127 space shuttle mission and the Expedition 19 International Space Station mission, for becoming the 500th person to fly into space.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Star Print ordered on the resolution.

bill.summary: 7/23/2009--Introduced. Recognizes Commander Chris Cassidy, space shuttle mission specialist of the STS-127 space shuttle mission and the Expedition 19 International Space Station (ISS) mission, for becoming the 500th person in history to fly into space. Commends Commander Cassidy and the STS-127 space shuttle mission crew for risking their lives to advance science and human understanding.
